summary: ICP canister-based web app for Ardee Industries aluminum trading site with Internet Identity authentication, public marketing pages, a contact/inquiry submission flow, and admin-only inquiry management UI backed by a Motoko canister with access control.

existing_features.title: ICP canister project scaffold (Motoko backend + React/Vite frontend)
existing_features.description: Project scaffold includes build/deploy templates (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, canister.yaml), TypeScript frontend setup (Vite, Tailwind), and Motoko backend entrypoint wiring.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and login UI integrate with Internet Identity; actor creation and authenticated calls are supported via useInternetIdentity/useActor utilities.

existing_features.title: Backend authorization and access control (admin guard)
existing_features.description: Motoko authorization modules implement access control; frontend includes an AdminGuard component to restrict admin routes/pages.

existing_features.title: Public marketing site pages and layout
existing_features.description: Public pages (Home, About, Contact, Trading) with shared SiteLayout, SiteHeader, and SiteFooter.

existing_features.title: Inquiry submission form (contact/inquiry flow)
existing_features.description: Frontend inquiry form with mapping/serialization utilities to submit inquiries to the backend.

existing_features.title: Admin inquiries management UI
existing_features.description: Admin pages to view inquiries list and drill into inquiry details (AdminInquiriesPage, AdminInquiryDetailsPage).

existing_features.title: UI component system using shadcn/ui + Tailwind
existing_features.description: Shadcn UI component library added (accordion, dialog, form, table, etc.) with Tailwind configuration for consistent UI building blocks.

existing_features.title: Generated brand and hero imagery assets
existing_features.description: Generated aluminum-themed pattern, logo, and hero image included under frontend/public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Reusable build-template for ICP canister web app scaffold
existing_features.description: Adds a dedicated build-template workspace containing a full ICP app starter (Motoko backend + React/Vite frontend) with standard configs (pnpm workspace, canister.yaml/icp.yaml, Dockerfile, deploy.sh), shadcn/ui component set, and build scripts (e.g., image resize/prune, ESLint custom rules) for reuse across projects.

architectural_notes: Internet Identity used for authentication; authenticated actor pattern via frontend hooks.
Motoko backend includes reusable authorization/access-control modules; admin-only routes enforced in UI (AdminGuard).
Frontend is React + Vite + Tailwind with shadcn/ui component library; canister bindings via generated declarations.

A reusable build-template workspace is maintained alongside the app, including standard deploy/build configs plus tooling scripts (image resize/prune, custom ESLint rules) to keep scaffolding consistent.
